what:
Helper functions to get ICAO AIRAC ID and intervals as used in
    Aeronautical Information Services and Publications.
title:
Helper functions to get ICAO AIRAC ID and intervals as used in
    Aeronautical Information Services and Publications.
text: airac package helps determining ICAO’s AIRAC ID relevant date intervals used internationally data services European Network Manager. AIRAC stands Aeronautical Information Regulation Control indicates period used publish disseminate changes aeronautical data.

code: library(airac)  airac_interval("2307") #> [1] 2023-07-13 UTC--2023-08-10 UTC library(airac)  cfmu_airac("2023-02-01") #> [1] 500
